Title: Establishes New York state renewable electric generation pilot programs
Summary: Establishes New York state renewable electric generation pilot programs to authorize the development of up to three hundred megawatts of renewable electric capacity statewide, in order to stimulate the growth of clean, affordable and reliable sources of energy and to foster new partnerships between electric corporations, energy producers and energy customers in this state.
LawCode: Add ยง73-b, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to New York state renewable electric generation pilot programs
